verses.verse: Rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, O ye righteous <S%H6662><s%>: for praise <S%H8416><s%> is comely <S%H5000><s%> for the upright <S%H3477><s%>.
Praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with harp <S%H3658><s%>: sing <S%H2167><s%> unto him with the psaltery <S%H5035><s%> and an instrument of ten strings <S%H6218><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto him a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%>; play <S%H5059><s%> skilfully <S%H3190><s%> with a loud noise <S%H8643><s%>.
For the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is right <S%H3477><s%>; and all his works <S%H4639><s%> are done in truth <S%H530><s%>.
He loveth <S%H157><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%>: the earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of the goodness <S%H2617><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
By the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> were the heavens <S%H8064><s%> made <S%H6213><s%>; and all the host <S%H6635><s%> of them by the breath <S%H7307><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
He gathereth <S%H3664><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> together as an heap <S%H5067><s%>: he layeth up <S%H5414><s%> the depth <S%H8415><s%> in storehouses <S%H214><s%>.
Let all the earth <S%H776><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: let all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> stand in awe <S%H1481><s%> of him.
For he spake <S%H559><s%>, and it was done; he commanded <S%H6680><s%>, and it stood fast <S%H5975><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> bringeth <S%H6331><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> to nought <S%H6331><s%>: he maketh <S%H5106><s%> the devices <S%H4284><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of none effect <S%H5106><s%>.

The counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> standeth <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the nation <S%H1471><s%> whose God <S%H430><s%> is the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> whom he hath chosen <S%H977><s%> for his own inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> looketh <S%H5027><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>; he beholdeth <S%H7200><s%> all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.
From the place <S%H4349><s%> of his habitation <S%H3427><s%> he looketh <S%H7688><s%> upon all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He fashioneth <S%H3335><s%> their hearts <S%H3820><s%> alike <S%H3162><s%>; he considereth <S%H995><s%> all their works <S%H4639><s%>.

There is no king <S%H4428><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> by the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of an host <S%H2428><s%>: a mighty man <S%H1368><s%> is not delivered <S%H5337><s%> by much <S%H7230><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%>.
An horse <S%H5483><s%> is a vain thing <S%H8267><s%> for safety <S%H8668><s%>: neither shall he deliver <S%H4422><s%> any by his great <S%H7230><s%> strength <S%H2428><s%>.
Behold, the eye <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is upon them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him, upon them that hope <S%H3176><s%> in his mercy <S%H2617><s%>;
To deliver <S%H5337><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>, and to keep them alive <S%H2421><s%> in famine <S%H7458><s%>.
Our soul <S%H5315><s%> waiteth <S%H2442><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: he is our help <S%H5828><s%> and our shield <S%H4043><s%>.
For our heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in him, because we have trusted <S%H982><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>.
Let thy mercy <S%H2617><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, be upon us, according as we hope <S%H3176><s%> in thee.
